CVE-2000-0008.summary: FTPPro allows local users to read sensitive information, which is stored in plain text.

CVE-2000-0010.summary: WebWho+ whois.cgi program allows remote attackers to execute commands via shell metacharacters in the TLD parameter.

CVE-2000-0017.summary: Buffer overflow in Linux linuxconf package allows remote attackers to gain root privileges via a long parameter.

CVE-2000-0019.summary: IMail POP3 daemon uses weak encryption, which allows local users to read files.

CVE-2000-0020.summary: DNS PRO allows remote attackers to conduct a denial of service via a large number of connections.

CVE-2000-0028.summary: Internet Explorer 5.0 and 5.01 allows remote attackers to bypass the cross frame security policy and read files via the external.NavigateAndFind function.

CVE-2000-0031.summary: The initscripts package in Red Hat Linux allows local users to gain privileges via a symlink attack.

CVE-2000-0034.summary: Netscape 4.7 records user passwords in the preferences.js file during an IMAP or POP session, even if the user has not enabled "remember passwords."

CVE-2000-0038.summary: glFtpD includes a default glftpd user account with a default password and a UID of 0.

CVE-2000-0040.summary: glFtpD allows local users to gain privileges via metacharacters in the SITE ZIPCHK command.

CVE-2000-0047.summary: Buffer overflow in Yahoo Pager/Messenger client allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service via a long URL within a message.

CVE-2000-0065.summary: Buffer overflow in InetServ 3.0 allows remote attackers to execute commands via a long GET request.

CVE-2000-0066.summary: WebSite Pro allows remote attackers to determine the real pathname of webdirectories via a malformed URL request.

CVE-2000-0067.summary: CyberCash Merchant Connection Kit (MCK) allows local users to modify files via a symlink attack.

CVE-2000-0069.summary: The recover program in Solstice Backup allows local users to restore sensitive files.

CVE-2000-0074.summary: PowerScripts PlusMail CGI program allows remote attackers to execute commands via a password file with improper permissions.

CVE-2000-0081.summary: Hotmail does not properly filter JavaScript code from a user's mailbox, which allows a remote attacker to execute the code by using hexadecimal codes to specify the javascript: protocol, e.g. jAvascript.

CVE-2000-0084.summary: CuteFTP uses weak encryption to store password information in its tree.dat file.

CVE-2000-0085.summary: Hotmail does not properly filter JavaScript code from a user's mailbox, which allows a remote attacker to execute code via the LOWSRC or DYNRC parameters in the IMG tag.

CVE-2000-0093.summary: An installation of Red Hat uses DES password encryption with crypt() for the initial password, instead of md5.

CVE-2000-0101.summary: The Make-a-Store OrderPage shopping cart application allows remote users to modify sensitive purchase information via hidden form fields.

CVE-2000-0102.summary: The SalesCart shopping cart application allows remote users to modify sensitive purchase information via hidden form fields.

CVE-2000-0103.summary: The SmartCart shopping cart application allows remote users to modify sensitive purchase information via hidden form fields.

CVE-2000-0104.summary: The Shoptron shopping cart application allows remote users to modify sensitive purchase information via hidden form fields.

CVE-2000-0106.summary: The EasyCart shopping cart application allows remote users to modify sensitive purchase information via hidden form fields.

CVE-2000-0108.summary: The Intellivend shopping cart application allows remote users to modify sensitive purchase information via hidden form fields.

CVE-2000-0109.summary: The mcsp Client Site Processor system (MultiCSP) in Standard and Poor's ComStock is installed with several accounts that have no passwords or easily guessable default passwords.

CVE-2000-0110.summary: The WebSiteTool shopping cart application allows remote users to modify sensitive purchase information via hidden form fields.

CVE-2000-0114.summary: Frontpage Server Extensions allows remote attackers to determine the name of the anonymous account via an RPC POST request to shtml.dll in the /_vti_bin/ virtual directory.

CVE-2000-0115.summary: IIS allows local users to cause a denial of service via invalid regular expressions in a Visual Basic script in an ASP page.

CVE-2000-0123.summary: The shopping cart application provided with Filemaker allows remote users to modify sensitive purchase information via hidden form fields.

CVE-2000-0126.summary: Sample Internet Data Query (IDQ) scripts in IIS 3 and 4 allow remote attackers to read files via a .. (dot dot) attack.

CVE-2000-0129.summary: Buffer overflow in the SHGetPathFromIDList function of the Serv-U FTP server allows attackers to cause a denial of service by performing a LIST command on a malformed .lnk file.

CVE-2000-0134.summary: The Check It Out shopping cart application allows remote users to modify sensitive purchase information via hidden form fields.

CVE-2000-0135.summary: The @Retail shopping cart application allows remote users to modify sensitive purchase information via hidden form fields.

CVE-2000-0136.summary: The Cart32 shopping cart application allows remote users to modify sensitive purchase information via hidden form fields.

CVE-2000-0137.summary: The CartIt shopping cart application allows remote users to modify sensitive purchase information via hidden form fields.

CVE-2000-0142.summary: The authentication protocol in Timbuktu Pro 2.0b650 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service via connections to port 407 and 1417.

CVE-2000-0143.summary: The SSH protocol server sshd allows local users without shell access to redirect a TCP connection through a service that uses the standard system password database for authentication, such as POP or FTP.

CVE-2000-0145.summary: The libguile.so library file used by gnucash in Debian GNU/Linux is installed with world-writable permissions.

CVE-2000-0182.summary: iPlanet Web Server 4.1 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service via a large number of GET commands, which consumes memory and causes a kernel panic.

CVE-2000-0220.summary: ZoneAlarm sends sensitive system and network information in cleartext to the Zone Labs server if a user requests more information about an event.

CVE-2000-0649.summary: IIS 4.0 allows remote attackers to obtain the internal IP address of the server via an HTTP 1.0 request for a web page which is protected by basic authentication and has no realm defined.
